channel.title: Kilkenny on Argolon Solutions
channel.description: Recent content in Kilkenny on Argolon Solutions

item.title: PodCamp is this Saturday
item.description: PodCamp last year was one of my conference highlights and it looks like they are pulling out all the stops this year. Head on down to Kilkenny this coming Saturday if you want to see what it’s all about. Tons of information and pre-conference activity on the PodCamp Ireland site.

item.title: Patrick Purcell
item.description: I was emailed the other day by Paul Brennan of Ormonde Design, an old friend from way back. He told me about the sad passing of Professor Patrick Purcell of Imperial College London, who he described as a great innovator but little known Kilkenny man. I read a fine but short obituary of him here and realised that here was a man we should all have known much more about. The opening paragraph really drives this home:
